website_summaries.verdict: Go-to palette with a dozen neutral colors you can wear every day - and night. If you buy only one, this is it, users say.
pros: Twelve essential eyeshadow colors perfect for daily use
Made with real clay from the Amazon
Pigment stays put even on oily skin, all day
Can be used as eye liner as well
cons: A few customers reported their palettes arrived damaged
Some dislike its slightly sweet smell

customer_reviews.title: Rich colors with staying power!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors in this palette. Shadows go on smoothly and colors are true. I have very oily lids where eyeshadows will crease and run, but these shadows stay put all day! Some reviewers complain about the smell (sweet/candy-like) and it initially bothered me, but now I barely notice it. The smell is more noticeable when you are applying the shadows. I don't notice it the rest of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen O

customer_reviews.title: Best Matte Eyeshadow Pallet
customer_reviews.text: I first saw Tarte's Tartelette Clay Matte Eyeshadow at Ulta. I loved the colors but I decided to wait on buying it because the price was a little high for my budgett. Then my cousin bought it and told me that it was a must have, so I bought it on Amazon and I am so glad I did. My cousin was right, the Tarte Tartelette Clay Matte Eyeshadow is a must have. I wear it everyday and the color stays on all day. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: My go to palette
customer_reviews.text: I have soooo many palettes including several Urban Decay naked and two faced. This tarte palette is perfect for an everyday look. The colors are rich but subtle and natural. It blends well and even smells good. I might buy a second one for when I work my way through the one I purchased. It's my fave!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: So glad you had this Tartelette Amazonian Clay Matte Palette THANK YOU
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this matte eye shadow palette and it is back ordered every where except here. Worth every penny. High quality usable eye colors. No loud colors, glitter or metallic shiny on lids. The colors blend well and multiple combinations. Be careful with the black in the corner, fashionista, a tiny bit goes a long way. Great for everyday, work or date nights - a great all around usable eye shadow palette. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic matte shadows
customer_reviews.text: If you desire a versatile pallet of matte shades Amazonian Clay by Tartlette is perfect! There are three coordinated looks in the pallet but obviously the make up artist in you will create numerous day and evening looks with these gorgeous shades!
customer_reviews.author: Cj Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing colors. All are matte
customer_reviews.text: Amazing colors. All are matte. Beautiful colors for a mature woman, or for a natural look for a young woman.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: nice colors, too matte for my tastes
customer_reviews.text: The colors were nice though some of them were so close together I feel like this palette would have been complete with about half as many colors. Even though I wanted matte, the colors just looked really dull on. For the price I would have expected better.
customer_reviews.author: pmilli

customer_reviews.title: awesome quality, pigment and smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've never paid more than $10 for eye shadow so I feel Im probably easy to please but I was so impressed with the quality of this palet. I don't think I'll go back to spending drug store prices on eye shadow. I love that the blacks work well for a powder liner and that there a similar shades for all tones to blend nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanninemarie

customer_reviews.title: Nice bubble wrap
customer_reviews.text: The box came heavily wrapped in bubble wrap, but it still ended up dented and scratched. Not a big deal, but I wished it didn’t look that was, as this is a gift
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Great range of neutrals
customer_reviews.text: These shadows are highly pigmented and go on beautifully. If you have older skin you'll appreciate the matt finish.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: All the colors needed
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth time I have had these palette of eye shadows. First of all, there are no irridensint particles that seem to bother my skin. I use several of the colors daily when do my eyes which means I don't need separate eye shadows; they are all in one box. I even blend two colors for the perfect eyebrow color. I hope this continues to be available for years!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Great colors durable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these because my sister raves about them I normally would not have spent this much money on makeup but love it
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors- all roses/pinks/browns that work well for blue-eyed girls, and nothing shiny. They coordinate well and are long-lasting.
customer_reviews.author: dlee86

customer_reviews.title: Easy to blend and apply over primer!
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product! I'd love to see a lighter, medium and darker palette unto themselves! I basically only use half the palette, but love the product. I use eyeshadow primer and it stays on all day and blends beautifully! I get comments all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Q

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Its my new best shadow , this palette is my first thing I try from tarte now am Excited to try other stuff
customer_reviews.author: rofy h

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors and great pigmentation
customer_reviews.text: The colors are great. The pigmentation is wonderful. Great colors. I use the darker ones as an eyeliner. Work beautifully! Very happy with this pallette.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pallet- colors that actually work on me, it smells like chocolate , really silky
customer_reviews.author: Shawntell Epling

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Love the palette but i ordered it at the place I was staying in Florida and it came with two of the eye shapes destroyed and of course it was the two darkest colors, just upset I paid so much and didn’t even get to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Blythe asbell

customer_reviews.title: This pallette is beautiful!! Perfect for green eyes and non irritating
customer_reviews.text: This pallette is beautiful!! Perfect for green eyes and non irritating, long lasting, absolutely blendable! I am so happy with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It crumbled!
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken! Very messy 3 of the eye shadow was not intact! Opened pakage it got on everything! It mixed with the other colors and ruined the eye pallet! Very dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Desormeaux

customer_reviews.title: Packing the palette
customer_reviews.text: I am a little upset because my plate on one of the colors was cracked. I thought they said it would be packed to perfect
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could buy it again for the first time
customer_reviews.text: This actually has the right to be called highly pigmented. It blends. It lasts. It’s gorgeous. I wish I could buy it again for the first time...
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: The brst
customer_reviews.text: These colors are Beyond amazing. Gives you the ability to create many different looks. Really the only palette you would need if you were looking for just one. My go to I palette for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect matt colors.
customer_reviews.text: Love the matt colors. Perfect for a day/natural look, dressy or a smoky eye look. I actually used the little tutorial and liked the results.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Awesome eye shadow
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this eye shadow in the past, but this is the first time ordering online. It is some of the best eye shadow I have ever used. I love that it is matte!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed came broken
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this today but as soon as I opened the box you could see the darkest shade had broken and spread itself everywhere. I opened package and it had spread on other colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessicad

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients were different from description
customer_reviews.text: Ingredients were different from description from Skinsafe website and Ulta website.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeshadow I have ever used. I use it for my clients as well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Beth Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Love every color
customer_reviews.text: Love every color. This is the best shadow I have ever used. It stays on and applies better than the more expensive department store shadows I have tried. I am happy to find so many matte colors.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Sholer

customer_reviews.title: It's 100% amazing and worth my money
customer_reviews.text: It's 100% amazing and worth my money. These colors are gorgeous and you can use them in the morning or at night. I wish though it comes with its own brush. Go ahead and buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Fatmah Albathali

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I love Tarte Cosmetics and this item is no exception. Tarte has some of the best pigmentation I've ever found in eyeshadows and blushes. I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shirlin Poupard

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my eyes and eyelids itch... won't use it again, most likely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the colors
customer_reviews.text: great eye shadow without sparkles for older eyes. Natural and muted. Love them
customer_reviews.author: berickson

customer_reviews.title: Great for fair skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love this palette! I have fair skin and all of the colors look great. Unfortunately, it took 4 days to arrive and not the 2 as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Gdula

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Looks beautiful on and goes on well as well as stays
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Fanning

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice colors from very light to deep dark one, loved it
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrive on time and it was not damage. Package really good.
customer_reviews.author: Logicprobe

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product! Love tarte eyeshadows. Arrived quickly & packaged very carefully
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: Items came in only 2 days after order....love the matte colors of this pallette
customer_reviews.author: Doris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors but one of them was broken when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Walker

customer_reviews.title: dirty
customer_reviews.text: The palette itself was dirty when it arrived. I had to wipe it down and remove the cover from the mirror, which I prefer not to do. For $58, it should've been spotless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: got this for my daughter and she loves it. goes on easy and lasts all day with no irritation
customer_reviews.author: Tod Lange

customer_reviews.title: ... be my first expensive makeup purchase and I absolutely love it! I love the matte colors and how ...
customer_reviews.text: This would be my first expensive makeup purchase and I absolutely love it! I love the matte colors and how pretty they are.
customer_reviews.author: HNS6

customer_reviews.title: Came earlier then expected and in great shape!!!! 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: This pallete is absolutely beautiful and they won't let you down!
customer_reviews.author: Adra schell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The colors were beautiful and it was a nice matte. It is perfect for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was great. Very pigmented and easy to blend but there ...
customer_reviews.text: It was great. Very pigmented and easy to blend but there was a weird smell when I opened the palette.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's so beautiful palette 💗💗😍 but your delivery is late.. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: fatimah

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Tbh I absolutely love it, it is so beautiful, I think it is worth the price👌
customer_reviews.author: Johana R.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday 😍 they are so long wear and go on so well!
customer_reviews.author: Tylah Hunt-Murtic

customer_reviews.title: I purchased it after seeing all the tutorials and because Tarte is so great and all that
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm....mixed feelings about this. I purchased it after seeing all the tutorials and because Tarte is so great and all that. The colors are matte, which I wanted, but the lighter colors do look less pigmented on my light face. I would suggest getting the little mini Tartelettes for the specific colors you love before investing in this big one. Very fair skin would probably be best suited for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatest ever
customer_reviews.text: 10x better than my naked palettes! Would purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Literally perfect and just what I wanted! LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeshadows for older women!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are thirty five years and older, this is a must have palette! All the colors on the palette are not offensive and can be used from day to evening. I pretty much use all the colors on the palette. It is worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: One of the shadows
customer_reviews.text: One of the eyeshadows was already cracked when i first opened the palette.
customer_reviews.author: Khaled Al Najjar

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best make up purchases I have made in years. I am 60, and matte is best. The color palette is great in this set. Good texture, easy to build color. Completely effortless to come up with a natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Eliana Selzer

customer_reviews.title: I love this palette
customer_reviews.text: I love this palette! The colors are lovely, they blend well and seem very pigmented. It's my first tarte product but definitely not my last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i received this item and it has scratches all over ...
customer_reviews.text: i received this item and it has scratches all over it and it didn't have any protection for delivery at all
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Easily blendable. Nice matte finish, soft on eye lids, day or night wear
customer_reviews.author: Bess Redz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, elegant palette. It's everything I expected and more. Very versatile and great color selection.
customer_reviews.author: Vivienne

customer_reviews.title: Simply Lovely.
customer_reviews.text: These came double packed to insure a damage free product. The eye shadows are in a beautiful case with a ample sized mirrow. All the shadows are matte and are so beautiful. I am so looking forward to use every day.
customer_reviews.author: TunaChick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful palette I love the purple packaging and it has a nice big mirror. The shadows are pigmented and creamy highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: cushla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just love how all the colors blend beautifully together
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome authentic product, took a bit to receive but it was worth the wait:)
customer_reviews.author: maragarita

customer_reviews.title: I love this palette..
customer_reviews.text: You totally need a good eye primer or this stuff slides right off within an hour. But with a good primer? Nice, vibrant colors (as vibrant as this palette can be lol) that lasted 14 hours! I love the shades and the classy looks one may create with this palette. It is too pricey imo but it was a treat to myself and I am very happy I bought it. I use it every day, sometimes using something like Burberry Pale Barley eyeshadow in the crease, over one of the Tartelette colors.. it all blends so beautifully and I am very happy with this purchase--both the item and the quick service.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Swahn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great color payoff and very easy to blend. Love all matte shadows!!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Vidal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. Thanks GOD that I have it.
customer_reviews.author: fofobajaber-2014

customer_reviews.title: and finally got it on a great sale. But I have to say I do ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting for this to go on sale b/c I have heard so many people rant about it, and finally got it on a great sale. But I have to say I do not love it...I had high hopes that it would be my go-to makeup, but the colors in this palate just don't look good on me and seem to be a little off from what is advertised (I understand colors can differ from computer screen to real-life so it's not a fault of the product - they just don't look great on me). They apply very well, I just wish the colors looked better on me.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Too purple for me but still a great product
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when I first got it but truly I only use like 4 of the colors. The light colors I can barely tell the difference between them. The dark colors are very pigmented though. I just don't like the color choices so much but its hard to tell from an online picture.These are more cool tones like plums and purples. I would recommend going to a store and checking it out in person before dishing out the 45$. I do love that this is paraben free as I am in the process of phasing out toxic skincare. Also I do like Tarte as a brand though and these are quality shadows.
customer_reviews.author: F. Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Great matte shadow for older women
customer_reviews.text: For those of us older women who have lines around the eyes matte shadow is a real must. I fully trust the Tarte brand to have a lower exposure to toxins, and an excellent grasp of the current color favorites. I’ve use this product for a couple of weeks now, and I’m thoroughly pleased. It’s hard to find a quality product like this with all Matte eyeshadow only. I recommend giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Flattering Colors and True Matte Eyeshadows.
customer_reviews.text: These colors are wonderful because they are matte and true matte eyeshadow is almost impossible to find. If you are older (or just have wrinkled eyelids ) ; ) these are for you. The sparkle and even the sheen type eyeshadows just highlight wrinkles. Try these; you will like the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: I can use all the colors in this palette--very versatile and pretty. It also smells like waffle cones. However, the reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that there's no place to store a small brush, which would be nice. Also, it's very thin, but it's big. I'd have preferred something a little smaller for packing.
customer_reviews.author: steveirwin

customer_reviews.title: Why do my eyes need to smell like candy?
customer_reviews.text: I bought Tarte eyeshadow because I thought their stuff was more natural. When I started using it, the palette smelled strongly like synthetic candy smell. I have sensitive skin/eyes, and don't need my eyelids to smell like candy. What is the point in that?
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Super palette!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy I bought this palette! I already have a lot, but this one is only matte and colours are superb: warm tones, cool tones and purple tones. Texture is smooth and there is a large mirror. This palette is now one of my favourites :-)
customer_reviews.author: Laurence L

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my beautician who also does make up. It is very nice. A great selection of shades ,they stat on all day and the case is attractive. Will reorder when needed .
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: From daytime to nighttime this set fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: Nice chart to show a couple examples of using the colors in this set. Of course I have one daytime color I am using more than any other colors. I have, however, used several colors in the set and may possibly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the color palette, and 0 stars for packaging.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the Tarte box, there was black residue everywhere. It was on the exterior of the box, on the instruction sheet, and all over the plastic protector. Miraculously, once I cleaned up my counter, hands, and everything else, the palette was fairly clean. I'm keeping it because I've already invested time and effort to clean it up, but be warned.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked everywhere for a MATTE, NUDE, high pigment ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked everywhere for a MATTE, NUDE, high pigment shadow and this is it. DEF worth the price. The six darkest colors are crazy pigmented and it doesn't crease or come off with my primer and setting spray used with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought mine from Creative Merchandise!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant buying it for $28, because I’ve been wanting to buy it and it retails for $40 at my local Ulta so I was just hesitant so I asked if it was authentic and it was 100%. I received and I was in love the packaging was on point came with the plastic one(the one that covers the shadows) and it smelled like vanilla/coco? Since I own tarte eyeshadows, I can say I like this for basic everyday looks.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Great quality love the color pallet
customer_reviews.text: I live this pallet the colors are perfect for me! I will say it was packaged poorly and the one of the colors was totally broken.
customer_reviews.author: sharon medran

customer_reviews.title: It's Nice But Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The eye shadow is fine. I like the colors. It applies easily and smoothly. But, honestly, so does the drug store brand I usually use. Just can't see why this product costs $50. After this, I will go back to a drug store brand with a more reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Sisk

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: At first I balked at the price, but after using this color palette I love it. Good color, stays on and best of all, I kid you not, it smells like cookies or cake batter when you open it.
customer_reviews.author: Dayanera Jane

customer_reviews.title: Most have palette
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The colors are great and wear well. You can make a natural day look or a more dramatic night look with this palette. Very little fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful eye shadows - high quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful eye shadows - high quality. The colours are very matte and rich - no need to reapply ten times... and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Katiyana

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift and she said the product was very good and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pal

customer_reviews.title: The colors are just as they apear!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the color selection and can't wait to try them.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine Ward

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MATTE EYESHADOW!
customer_reviews.text: So glad to get MATTE eyeshadows. The glitter/sparkly eyeshadows look terrible on women over 40. These colors are very pretty, too...
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: My new "Go To"
customer_reviews.text: Love this pallette, it's pretty much my go to everyday look product. With the 12 different shades there are quite a few looks that you can put together. They are all really pigmentted and last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Must have for everyday
customer_reviews.text: Blends easily and the colors are perfectly paired to use together. The perfect palette for natural looks.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Matt Eye Shadows
customer_reviews.text: I had searched everywhere for matt eye shadows in the right colors as I am a Senior with natural platinum color hair and the glittery eye shadows just don't work. It is available elsewhere at a lesser price, but I am a Prime Member, so I received it in 2 days which was important!
customer_reviews.author: SuzeeQ

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great matte finish for older women to use. Also, has lasted long, use daily since I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronna

customer_reviews.title: The colors are beautiful, but take care when applying
customer_reviews.text: The colors are beautiful, but take care when applying. They are true to color and very little of the product is needed for application.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: The palatte was great! The quality is as expected
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and the trasaction was smooth. The palatte was great! The quality is as expected. And I'll be buying again cuz I'll help out a family business with my purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love all these colors
customer_reviews.text: Love all these colors. Very good eyeshadow. Price is a bit high but you don't mind paying for more for good quality.
customer_reviews.author: millia

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: All matte eyeshadows by tarte?? Oh yessss. Gorgeous colors & blend like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: hrayannec

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love matte eye shadows. This is my fav now
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn Doan

customer_reviews.title: Love it, wish it came with a brush.
customer_reviews.text: Great colors! This pallette sells out everywhere, but I found it here at a great price. It comes with an insert to show you a couple of looks. My only complaint is that it does not come with a brush, a lot of comparable palettes. The colors are warm and neutral. There are not any colors that I do not think I will use, which is rare for me and buying eye palettes. So far, I am a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: somuchcheese

customer_reviews.title: Best of morning looks and or smoky eyes
customer_reviews.text: WOW.. This palette is amazing and all the colors are highly pigmented. I love that it's all mat shades and very compact in size. One of my favorite palettes for daily use. Best of morning looks and or smoky eyes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Alhameli

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty fabulous& great matte colors!
customer_reviews.text: Great pigment, and I love all of the matte colors! Tarte makes some of my favorite cosmetics. The compact isn't as sturdy as I'd like it to be, but I'm just extra careful with it. You can't go wrong with it!
customer_reviews.author: S.C. Bicknell

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: It arrived broken, dirty, full of scratches! Had to clean up a major eyeshadow mess which took forever. For $50 I'm now missing 3 colors!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Petrone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased to find this eye shadow pallet with all matte colors! The colors are great!
customer_reviews.author: dana smith

product_meta.title: tartelette Amazonian clay matte palette
feature_bullets: An all-matte palette with 12 exclusive eye shadows.

12 x 0.053 oz Shadows in Free Spirit (cream), Force Of Nature (nude), Dreamer (warm brown), Multi-Tasker (chocolate), Caregiver (pale pink), Natural Beauty (mauve), Best Friend (mulberry), Bombshell (dark plum), Super Mom (ivory), Wanderer (light brown), Power Player (taupe), Fashionista (black). - Step-by-step look guide

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
